title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository – a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers (via proxy) to chat, stream, and list local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; manage models and multi-user chats in a polished UI.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Community-built rich terminal UI for Ollama that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples for running Ollama containerised with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API for embedding local LLMs in Rust apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in deepset Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component template that wires Ollama chat streaming into interactive data apps with minimal code.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin library for Ollama exposing synchronous and reactive APIs; published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints for chat, completion, and embeddings in Rails or plain Ruby.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-backed process management and streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming chat examples.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama service for chat, embeddings, and model management in TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package enabling on-device LLM conversations via Ollama for desktop and mobile prototypes.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official curated model library (Modelfile) recipes for Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama, and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.
